editor.increaseIndentPattern:
(?x)
# From language-html
<(?!\?|(?:area|base|br|col|frame|hr|html|img|input|link|meta|param)\b|[^>]*/>)
([-_\.A-Za-z0-9]+)(?=\s|>)\b[^>]*>(?!.*</\1>)
|<!--(?!.*-->)
|<\?php.+?\b(if|else(?:if)?|for(?:each)?|while)\b.*:(?!.*end\1)
|\{[^}"']*$
# Blade specific
|(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])
 @
 (
  can
 |cannot
 |else
 |elseif
 |empty
 |for
 |foreach
 |forelse
 |hasSection
 |if
 |push
 |section
 |unless
 |while
 )
 \b
|(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])
 @php\b
 (?! # Not followed by
  \s*\( # Single line @php ($expression)
 |.*(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])@endphp\b # @endphp on same line
 )
